Is there anyway to make a [[test]] block not depend on the rest of the project?

I'd like to run tests which don't need the project to be compiled and I would like to avoid having to introduce python just to script this test harness.
I've written a test runner which does exactly what I want but it still has an implicit dependency on the rest of the project which i'd like to avoid
You could make a second crate in the same workspace just for standalone tests.
Yea that's what I'm currently thinking of doing, just wondering if there was another way
it's a little sucky everything i want to test is inside the main crate directory but a little ../ never hurt anyone
